attributes.action: Parliament debate restrictions on freedoms in Britain as a result of Covid
attributes.additional_details: Because liberties of the people are being taken away. We are supposed to live in a democracy yet a handful of people are making decisions,  unchecked,  about how we live our lives.
attributes.background: The government should stop bringing about restrictions under the Covid 19 act, and Parliament should debate any current and forthcoming restrictions

rejection.details: Parliament is already required to approve restrictions, and since you started your petition the Government has committed to bringing forward debates on regulations before they are enacted wherever possible.
